title: Better a Lie Than a Truth
overview: Successful businessman and entrepreneur Qiao Mu Sheng meets Su Nian, a classmate whom he has not seen for several years. Su Nian, who is the editor of the magazine, does not hesitate to pursue Qiao Mu Shing for an interview. Qiao Mu Sheng reluctantly reveals that his real identity is not Qiao Mu Sheng.Stubborn Su Nian rented a room next to him to solve the mystery, but soon got into a difficult situation â€” she fell in love with two people at the same time. She would have to get out of this situation until she revealed Xiao Machine's secret.
